children: Guideline-directed medical therapy for patients with stable ischemic heart disease (SIHD). ACC = American College of Cardiology; ACEI = ACE inhibitor; AHA = American Heart Association; ARB = angiotensin receptor blocker; BB = β-blocker; BID = twice daily; BP = blood pressure; CPAP = continuous positive airway pressure; eGFR = estimated glomerular filtration rate; GLP-1 = glucagon-like peptide 1; HbA
; LDL-C = LDL cholesterol; MI = myocardial infarction; PCSK9 = proprotein convertase subtilisin/kexin type 9; SGLT2 = sodium-glucose cotransporter 2; TG = triglycerides.

footnotes: Adapted with permission from Katz D, Gavin MC. Stable ischemic heart disease.
